DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial determine postoperative ibuprofen arthroscopic rotator cuff repair impact postoperative opiate medication use , Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) pain score , shoulder range motion ( ROM ) , repair integrity .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Ibuprofen Postoperative Opiate Medication Use Shoulder
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize two cohort : 1 . Ibuprofen 400mg mouth three time daily . Patients also receive standard opiate medication ( hydrocodone/acetaminophen 10mg/325mg ) UCSF orthopaedic clinic postoperative pain control . 2 . Placebo tablet mouth three time daily . Patients also receive standard opiate medication ( hydrocodone/acetaminophen 10mg/325mg ) UCSF orthopaedic clinic postoperative pain control . Patients screen study preoperative clinic vist randomize day surgery meet inclusion criterion . Postoperatively , see 1 week , 6 week , 3 month , 6 month , 1 year , 2 year . Pill count do 1 week postoperative visit . VAS pain score assess every visit . Functional shoulder outcome include shoulder range motion American Shoulder Elbow Society ( ASES ) survey complete visit well . The SF-12 health Disabilities Arm , Shoulder , Hand ( DASH ) survey complete preoperative visit final follow-up visit . We assess rotator cuff repair integrity ultrasound study 1 year surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year old Patients undergo arthroscopic rotator cuff repair Patients le 18 year age , pregnant , incarcerated . Women postmenopause screen pregnancy preoperatively urine test per UCSF Orthopaedic Institute preoperative guideline .
